title: HeyGuys, My name is SIN Juves and I am the jungler for SIN Gaming AMA.
body:
Starting at 6pm tonight I will be answering any questions you guys have for me whether it be lifestyle, league or meme related. Below Ill give you guys some Info about me and my interests.

I am a 22 year old University student currently completing my Honours in Biomechanics as well as sessional teaching at university which just involves me taking a tutorial of 20 students. I have played soccer at a semi-professional level my whole life until injuries really set me back from taking the next step which converted me into gaming. Other hobbies I have include watching VIKINGSSSSSSSSSS, Coffees with the boys and clubbing but now ive settled down and tend to have more nights in than nights out.

I never really played many video games due to my training regime but due to being sidelined with injuries I began to play FIFA on Playstation (inb4 Playstation gamer idiot). I then ventured off into bigger and better things such as League of Legends, I started playing Late season 2 and never looked back. I still play soccer at an amateur level just to maintain some kind of fitness and hope one day to get back into the swing of things and see where it can take me, but for now I am content with how League is going and looking to make it internationally with SIN.

I have hovered Diamond, Master and Challenger ranking my whole career as Ive never had the correct attitude to remain consistently high elo. Im working on fixing that and becoming the best jungler I can be. I have a lot of competitive experience which involved me being a sub on Legacy for a long time in my early days but now I am the captain and jungler for SIN GAMING (FIGHTO).

I also stream league of legends over @ twitch.tv/notjuves, you will probably find me streaming throughout this AMA so dont be shy to pop by and say hi but please keep your questions for here.

replies.body: Why do you never gank top lane are you some kind of moron?
I think morons play top lane therefore I shall not visit the lane.
They should just call top lane the moron lane.

Hey Juves, as a diamond jungle main I feel like a I've been playing quite poorly as of late. I notice that I'm making lots of mistakes, more than I used to, but instead of finding a way to resolve it and improve my performance I keep drifting back into the same flawed playstyle. What do you use to remedy your off-streaks, and how have you improved your play in general to get to where you are now?

Hey pal dont think about it to much. We all go through bad phases but beating yourself down about it  wont help anyone. Identify one thing you want to work on in solo queue whether its invading, efficient ganking or just dying less and try execute that. Rather then focusing on not playing bad you are focusing on a aspect of your game you can improve. This will also allow you to forget about LP and I think when you arnt worried about LP is when you start climbing. That basically is my remedy to improve play, if I start losing a few games I just think "Ok Im losing because im careless and dying and not invading enough" therefore I fix that and hopefully win? I hope this helped.
Hey juves my mans, how long have you played league? and what champions did you use to gain elo?  love your stream bby

Hey duuuuuuuuuuuuude, 
Ive played league on and off for about 3 years now. I really started to gain ELO upon Elise release. I spammed elise when she was broken and gained elo for daysssssssssssssss. Thanks stop by my stream more often <3. In this meta though Id strongly suggest elise,reksai to gain elo.

Hey awesome to have a pro on here! I was wondering what the lowest rank you have ever been in and what is the hardest rank to climb through? Also what kind of nerves do you get before and during a pro game versing other pro teams? Are you super chill and calm or it is super exciting? 
Thanks! :)

Sorry for the late response dude but the lowest rank I have ever been was silver from memory. The hardest rank the climb through is always the one you arnt quite good enough to make yet. So if your gold 1 making platinum would be the hardest, if your diamond 5 making diamond 1 would be the hardest. its all relevant to your actual division. I get really nervous but I just visualize someone I idolize and how they deal with pressure and it kind of calms me down. Im a big UFC fan so when I think of connor mcgregor he laughs in the face of pressure and takes it in his stride which is what I try to do. Thanks for the question dude loved answering it.

> [{quoted}](name=SIN Juves,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=lkGgJs1B,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2016-03-04T09:22:08.180+0000)

Awesome! thanks so much for your response! Its so cool to have any kind of contact with a big pro player like yourself! Good luck in your coming games! Its really impressive that you are 3rd equal with CHF! I believe you can decimate Infurnum and Helions! and the CHF's again! Go Big! GL HF!
Thanks for your support man, let the decimation begin ;) !
5 man :(
Why u always got to carry RY?????
Its been the same throughout open ladder im just use to it.
Hi Juves - big fan here. I was just wondering why you're so BAD? and also how you cope with carrying the heaviest mid laner in OCE
I am bad because my mid laner is good.

What things have you found from your experience in high-level traditional sports that you can apply to high-level gaming/esports?

Who is your favourite Analyst? InsertKappaHere

I think being honest with your team mates is key. In traditional sport if someone plays poorly or could of done something better you tell them. In league I feel like sometimes people sugar coat things to not hurt the feelings of there team mates, but as an example over time rymeister and myself have built up an open and honest relationship where if he makes mistakes Ill let him know, works both ways. I think this improves team dynamic if everyone understand its for the good of the team and its never a personal attack.

Another key thing I feel is just being genuinely good friends with your teammates because to become successful you need to trust one another. I think these 2 points are most relatable  to traditional sports and esports.
How did u guys feel coming into super week? Did you feel confident in winning both sets or what was the approach coming in?

To be completely honest we performed incredibly well in the scrims leading up to super week but we weren't getting carried away as scrims really are irrelevant in the context of OPL. I think we were just extremely confident in our game plan to beat Chiefs and Direwolves, we felt our macro play went up a level and we could really take down anyone. In all honesty Ive said it for a long time we are a good team and we just need to turn it on when it counts so I guess I did kind of expect to win both games in super week? If you dont believe you can win then you've already lost.
Do you ever miss open ladder? Love ya Juves
I miss all the RP to be honest but I think thats as far as i will go.

What made you guys so good this week compared to previous weeks?
Honestly Hans I think everything just finally clicked... what we were working towards finally came out in a OPL game which is why it was so satisfying to 2-0 superweek.
Love you my mans <3
Who is the best {{champion:6}} and why is it me?
you are the urgod
Why is jungle the position you chose in pro play? What is your favourite champion of all time and if not currently in meta would you want them to be meta again?
It was what I started playing in solo queue because lee sin was fun and broken back in the day hahaha. Favourite champion of all time would have to be nidalee, just pouncing around on peoples heads.
How dinner going? {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
I had some nice special fried rice and now im drinking a coffeee MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM
{{summoner:17}} Whos the biggest Feeder OCE {{summoner:17}}
Hands down rymeister if you have ever played dynamic queue with the guy youll know what i mean

Who do you think is the most beautiful Player in OPL, Expect yourself.

Rymeister is a pleb, true or false

give us shout out - Twitter @kaliberOCE
I think the most BEAUTIFUL player in the OPL hands down is Tally. He has a soul that shines brighter then the sun and a face sent from angels.
hey juves can i have your girlfriend advice please , thanks , i appreciate it
Be yourself, Dont be someone your not. Patience is a virtue you will find the ONE, ONE day. Until then league of legends is your best friend it will never wake up one day and not love you ;)
Does main SIN roster have much interaction with the second team, how they going?

We tend to keep in touch with the academy team as much as we can whether it be through dynamic queue or memes. Its important to have a strong relationship with them because as far as we know we may need them to sub one day and they are a part of the SINFIGHTO fam.
Whats your favorite donut?
Id have to settle for the traditional Jam doughnut, can anyone pass that up?
what's your words per minute http://play.typeracer.com/
What are the best and worst parts of being the team captain? Do people depend on you for support outside of game?

I dont think there are any negatives to being team captain. It means they trust you enough to be the leader just believe in yourself and the decision your making for the team and it will all work out in the end. I tend to offer my support to all of my team members they know im always here to listen and help if anything is affecting them in game or out. I would do this regardless of being captain.
